# GroupSessionMessenger.DeliveryMode

**Enumeration**

The transmission characteristics to apply to the delivery of messages.

## Declaration

```swift
enum DeliveryMode
```

## Getting the delivery mode options

- **GroupSessionMessenger.DeliveryMode.reliable**: An attempt to ensure the delivery of messages to known participants.
- **GroupSessionMessenger.DeliveryMode.unreliable**: A best-effort attempt to deliver the message to known participants.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
